body:
This list represents the unchecked items in brson's list, sorted into categories which roughly correlate to what action they look like they'll need next, and annotated with summaries/updates where necessary. Duplicating mainly so I can have permissions on a copy of the list, with issue numbers turned into links correctly.

### Brson's Notes-To-Self
- [ ]  upload rustup.sh #19505
- [ ]  channel metadata #21243
- [X]  fix build date ~~#22774~~ closed in favor of #25812, which is now closed too
- [ ]  windows dist locking bug #21434
- [ ]  doc translation services #25660

### Things that got closed or became a different issue
- [ ]  release channel ~~#16677~~  #23757 is only surviving child of this issue
- [ ]  beta/stable integration automation #23756  -- closed for
  https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/23757
- [ ]  more android slaves #16795 -- will probably fork into enabling more
  android configs, if that doesn't exist yet
- [ ]  rust package desyncing rust-lang/rust-buildbot#7 -- is closed now, yay
- [ ]  cross-platform type system consistency for std #22228 -- original bug got
  closed; needs new bug?
- [ ]  remove metrics infra #19145 -- it got finished, then closed, then
  reopened by a comment referencing https://github.com/servo/html5ever/issues/72

### Things that look "easy"
- [ ]  benchmark bot #12458 -- looks "easy" if stuff still works
- [ ]  doc/master -> doc/nightly #17398  -- pretty sure i can do this one, but
  is it dev.rust-lang.org or static.rust-lang.org bucket?
- [ ]  test 'make install' #19698  -- has caused pile of bugs. maybe not done
  yet because slow? should be "easy"
- [ ]  guidelines #19315  -- work done in
  https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/22331 needs to be linked from somewhere
- [ ]  snap signing #13254  -- directly from
  https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/13252
- [ ]  upload feature list #25724 -- looks clearly defined, could be a good
  first "real bug"
- [ ]  www.rust-lang.org SSL #13180 -- kick nginx and the DNS

### Buildbot things, or things that'll change a lot if we switch CI
- [ ]  slave per build #22448 -- nice-to-have
- [ ]  fix dist security #20629  -- needs BUILDBOT to become https
- [ ]  ec2 spot instances #21904  -- looks like a matter of
  read-the-linked-manual
- [ ]  move from buildbot to taskcluster?

### Everything Else (mostly things that need design decisions)
- [ ]  testing 32 bit on distcheck #17344 -- need to add more cases to make
  check. Slowdowns incoming!
- [ ]  lexer tests #15880 -- hello, yak (hairier than its cousin the yacc)...
- [ ]  test more OS X #17269 -- tools are identified; licensing situation
  unknown
- [ ]  losing windows slaves #18703 -- needs troubleshooting
- [ ]  doc tools on dist bots #19200 -- needs design decision
- [ ]  mac minis -> macstadium #19286  -- needs research, design, implementation
- [ ]  package dbg std #20630  -- needs design decision
- [ ]  install source #19535 -- needs design decision
- [ ]  get rid of cloudfront #21239 -- turned into artifact invalidation. lots
  of noise here; having it broken makes many people very unhappy
- [ ]  cargo dist dir #21240 -- design decision kinda made; needs implementation
  knowledge
- [ ]  cargo compatibility bots rust-lang/cargo#1276  -- cargo needs better
  tests
